Subbed Projects.Show Name: World Destruction: Sekai Bokumetsu no Rokunin

Good Comments: Incomplete translation. Example - within the first 3 minutes of ep 1, a dish of food is served. Osu subtitled the dish name as a long line of romaji jibberish.
Really good quality, great translation, pretty fast. Definitely worth archiving.
Bad Comments: Great translation work, good encodes, delivered episodess quickly (about 2 days after it aired), and they were consistent overall.
